title: Petition to have all Bonus Turret Damage Treated Equally
body:
Recently, a stealth change was implemented against League's newest Live Server's champ, {{champion:518}} .

Her W, applied some bonus damage every 3rd auto attack, to every target, including turrets.

However, from my personal experience (I was using an On hit Neeko build for experimentation), when it came to early game use of this ability after killing a laner, Neeko gained no more shield plates than any other laner would. Most occasions of getting to a turret only gained her 1 shield plate. If it was top lane,  it was possible to get 2, if you had a sizeable minion wave.

In Contrast:

{{champion:24}} kills a champion in lane, and can kill almost 3 plates, because of his passive attack speed activation.
{{champion:22}} kills a champion, and still gets to use her rapid fire on turrets.
{{champion:51}} kills a champion, and her 6th hit still does bonus damage to turrets.
{{champion:131}} kills a champion, and gets to apply her passive to turrets.
{{champion:81}} gets an enhanced W, which does a burst chunk to turrets.
{{champion:3}} kills a champion, and has a MASSIVE passive on hit damage buff which affects turrets, that is exactly like Neeko and Diana's on hit bonuses.
{{champion:86}} Q does bonus damage to turrets and has a pretty short cooldown. About the same time it takes Neeko to 3X auto attack.
{{champion:240}} has a similar function to Jax. 4 hit skill that enhances damage and takes much less time to auto.
{{champion:54}} has enhanced auto damage to turrets.
{{champion:75}} Siphoning Strike applies to turrets and can almost 1 shot them.
{{champion:20}} Boosts ally turret takedowns when he damages a turret.
{{champion:33}} does aoe damage to turrets in addition to autos.
{{champion:37}} Power Chord works.
{{champion:44}} 's Passive does bonus damage to turrets.
{{champion:4}}  E enhance damage to turrets.
{{champion:67}} Recently buffed, can Enhance damage to a turret every time she Q's (up to .1 sec per cast)
{{champion:83}} Q does extra turret damage.
{{champion:142}} Her Sparkles still hurt turrets.

(This list doesn't even mention champs that have other mechanics to destroy turrets like Tristana, or Ziggs. Those kits are intentional. It also doesn't mention champs like Tryndamere who have mechanics who can make taking a turret quicker, champions like {{champion:36}} who can steroid their own AD).

What I'm getting at is...... this is unequal treatment. 

For one: Neeko building ADC or APC dramatically reduces the per hit damage from an AP build. There's a major tradeoff to using W as a turret killer. And if you went AP, her Autos were too slow to abuse it. Catch 22. Although I used it myself, I never saw my Turret damage in a single game go over 8900 damage. Compare that to champions who still have their kits, like Diana. Diana can end a game with 13-14k Turret damage. Jax/Graves can do 16k. Tryn can get over 20k. This feature of her W was hardly broken!

I've tried to use on hit Neeko since then: It literally takes her 20-24 seconds LATE GAME to take down a turret now, even when full built. In terms of turret takedowns, that's a JOKE. In the same time, Nasus could have taken TWO turrets. That's how long that is.

----------------------------
So I have a proposal Ladies and Gents (and Riot):

If you want to specifically nerf a 46% win champ in the one way she was remotely reliable:

_**Nerf the others as well.**_

This would put a dent into a lot of the complaints players field at you:

-Paper turrets (All turrets are still paper after you get past the first tier)
-Short games (Turret passive skill abuse is a huge reason for shorter games. One lane gets carried away before the others can leave their lanes, and a base opens up. Beginning of the end of the game)
- Some champions being uninteractive 

P.S : I'm not against {{item:3057}}  procs mind you. If you want to keep those fine, But I want equal potential of SKILLS to abuse turrets.

I'm going to add a poll and try my best to stay out of the comments.

replies.body:
The wordiness of this thread is a bit confusing. From what I’ve gathered, you’re saying Neeko lost her ability to proc W on towers this patch? (you haven’t explicity said so in your post, but that seems to be what you’re implying)

In any case, it should be per champion basis.

Champions like Mundo and Jax get “bonuses” against towers with their abilities because it affects their base stats. That’s how it’s coded. Jax’s W doesn’t do bonus damage against the tower though, whereas Nasus’ and Yorick’s Q does because Jax would become too strong of a splitpusher and teamfighter. Nasus and Yorick both have the anti-tower mechanic because their teamfight is less than good, so they need to be strong elsewhere.

With Caitlyn’s case, she has gained and lost and then again gained the ability to get Headshot stacks against turrets, depending if she’s too good in the meta or not. It seems like it can be used as a lever to buff a champion without it impacting how much damage it does to other champions.

Neeko (and AP champions in general) get decent damage conversion against turrets after reaching 150+ AP. Neeko is also strong in teamfights, so she (probably) shouldn’t get another nuke against turrets with her W. That being said, it’s an undocumented change, so it’s probably a bug.

Unless she's sitting in an unwarded bush, even if disguised, she is almost certain to miss/die/ or sometimes succeed only on Zhonya's..... at which point she's still Zhonya'd while her stun is active so the opponents wake up to action the same time SHE does, meaning they can still kill her without dying. 

I know it's easy to say "Burst Burst Burst" But actually try hitting her ult without Flash in a High elo. You won't, unless the opposing team is already fighting someone else and is pre-cc'd, and you approached from behind.

If all On hit damage on towers were equal jax would be procing his R and W on towers taking it even faster.  Jax's passive isnt an on hit effect its a self buff that stacks it self using on hit mechanics.

Also that midlane is the golden lane and people dont allow it to lose towers early as it effects whether your team will actually push past river later in the game.

Who are you to decry what is and isn't a champion's job?

Diana and Galio's jobs aren't to take turrets, and neither are any of the other champions I mentioned, even Jax Their jobs primarily are to kill champions in duels, and have a team presence. 

Turret takedowns are a secondary objective, and one some champs have to work for, while others don't.

P.S. Neeko isn't performing the best at Mid. She's performing best at Top/Support. And although selected less, her winning kits use {{item:3115}} {{item:3124}} , Not pure AP.

P.P.S. Mechanically linear "Overbuffed" Champions do not carry 46% win rates. I play Zyra, and openly defend arguments that she is "overbuffed." My Zyra play puts out 2-3 times the damage Neeko does. On ANY build. (I've recently stopped dicking around in Preseason Bronze; If you go look..... I've gained 4 consecutive ranks on Zyra in 2 weeks of only moderate play. Playing Zyra as Adc, Jungle, Support, Top. I win them ALL). Neeko's kit is like Zyra's: Oversimplified, Operates within its margins, but not outside of them, is extremely predictable, Except.... Neeko doesn't have a strong passive range that Zyra does, and takes about 20% more risk when skilling a champion. Her skills don't leave behind contingency plans or range extensions (I'm a pro at D III killing with Zyra at 1300 range. Her skills are only 975). Neeko is NOT a skill intensive champ, but at the same time has trouble anchoring and adjusting to opponents learning her kit. There's not much she can do once the community learns to dodge/minimize her E, detect and isolate her while she ults, and walks out of the very first pop of her Q. Once they learn to do all that.... she's pretty much stuck at that 46% until a significant buff comes along.

In contrast, I DO support Yasuo and Akali having a 46% Win rate, because they ARE skill curve intensive, and DO have huge deltas when mastered, that put their common players at 65-70% Win rates.
If it's not Galio's job to take turrets, then why does he say "I've got the big guy!" or "At last, a worthy opponent!" when attacking them?
I think they should just buff Neeko. much easier solution than nerfing a bunch of other champs.

I'm okay with either solution. But my sell is...... it's something they could do across the board to lengthen games, one of the complaints players never feel is solved and the attempt would be irrefuteable. (Turret shields are debateable)

P.S. Rammus' damage to a turret WITHOUT AP is up to 240 a second on his ult, plus his auto attacks. That's pretty competitive with Neeko that has an ACTIVE W.

I'm just arguing that all these champs have ways to kill Turrets much faster than normal. Either treat them all as voided and remove it so that everyone struggles to kill turrets. Or enable them all. There's no actual fairness in removing one, but not the others.
